traits.name: Terambulus (Sword Sword)
traits.desc: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8+2) slashing damage.

traits.name: Black Powder and Tar Special
traits.desc: Each creature in a 15-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 15ft. must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw. A target takes 2d6 fire damage on a failed save and their speed is reduced to 0 for 1 round, or half as much damage on a successful one.

traits.name: Surprising Riposte
traits.special: Recharges when missing with an attack
traits.desc: When missed by an attack, Tilius can make a Terambulus attack as a reaction with advantage.

traits.name: Hin Nimbleness
traits.desc: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

traits.name: Light Eater
traits.desc: You need half as much rations and water.
